name: Cowboy Gunslinger Action (CGA)
description:
Cowboy Action Gunslinger (CGA) is a game made for the CGAJam, The theme of the jam i used was western. 

Controls :
WASD - MOVE
ARROW KEYS - SHOOT
SPACE + WASD  - ROLL

Credits
Programming - Armando Alonso  @piranha_305
Music - James Downie @Jamesyknowsall
Art - Armando Alonso & Vivian Faxas @neondragonflyv
